extension_description.message: Save images from open tabs. Default action saves the largest image from the current tab.

commands_default_action_label.description: Description of the default Browser Action command

commands_placeholder_action_label.description: Description of the default Browser Action command

button_test_action_label.description: Description of executing test on current tab

browser_action_tooltip.description: Tooltip with extension name and currently selected ACTION

browser_action_menu_options.description: Menu label to open extension options

browser_action_menu_downloads.description: Menu label to open downloads folder

browser_action_menu_errors.description: Menu label to open errors popup

no_history_title.description: Title when there is no download history

no_errors_title.description: Title when there are no download errors

paths_failed_title.description: Title when there are errors with pathRules

downloads_failed_title.description: Title when there are errors with downloads

options_title.description: Page title for extension options with extension name

options_action_title.description: Title for the action option, which tabs to run the extension in

options_action_label_active.description: Option label for the action to run on the current tab

options_action_label_left.description: Option label for the action to run on tabs to the left of the current tab

options_action_label_right.description: Option label for the action to run on tabs to the right of the current tab

options_action_label_all.description: Option label for the action to run on all tabs

options_action_label_test.description: Option label for the test action to run on current tab

options_active_tab.description: Option label for the action to include the current tab (when action is Left or Right of the current tab)

options_browser_action_title.description: Option title for the default browser action

options_browser_action_label_download.description: Option label for the default action

options_browser_action_label_popup.description: Option label for the popup action

options_conflict_action_title.description: Title for the filename conflict options

options_conflict_action_label_uniquify.description: Option label for filename conflict to rename

options_conflict_action_label_overwrite.description: Option label for filename conflict to overwrite

options_filter_title.description: Title of the image filtering options

options_filter_label_max.description: Option label for selecting only the largest image

options_filter_label_all.description: Option label for selecting all images

options_filter_label_direct.description: Option label for selecting tabs that are only images

options_filter_label_direct_note.description: Additional note for selecting tabs that are only images

options_dimensions_title.description: Title of the minimum image dimensions option

options_dimensions_width_label.description: Option label for minimum image width

options_dimensions_height_label.description: Option label for minimum image height

options_download_path_note.description: Additional note for download folder option
options_download_path_note.message: Images are saved in your browsers download folder, you may name a subfolder to save into.

options_download_path_placeholder.description: Option input placeholder for downloads folder

options_drag_tooltip.description: Tooltip for widget to reorder items

options_path_rules_note.description: Additional note for path rules option
options_path_rules_note.message: Paths will be appended to your Download Subfolder.

options_rules_data_toggle.description: Option to toggle between rules interface to textarea allowing copy and paste

options_rules_empty_error.description: Error message when rules are empty

options_path_rules_append_default_label.description: Label to append default path rules

options_path_rule_add_placeholder.description: Option input placeholder for path rule add

options_path_rule_delete_tooltip.description: Tooltip for path rule delete button

options_path_rule_test_label.message: Enter an image URL to test path rules

options_path_rule_test_note.message: Note: this cannot test TAB or ALT rules

options_rule_test_button_label.description: Label for path rule test button

options_rule_test_url_error.description: Error message when test URL is empty or invalid

options_rule_test_null_result.description: Error message rule test gives no filename

options_close_tab.description: Option label to close tabs after downloading

options_notify_ended.description: Option label to show notification after downloading

options_remove_ended.description: Option label to remove downloads from history

options_download_num.description: Option label for maximum number of concurrent downloads

options_download_async.description: Option label to download in asynchronous mode

options_download_async_note.description: Additional note for download in asynchronous mode
options_download_async_note.message: (downloads using #index path rules may be numbered out of order)

options_download_private.description: Option label to download in Private Browsing mode

options_download_private_note.description: Additional note for download in Private Browsing mode option
options_download_private_note.message: (will break downloads that require authentication or cookies)

options_allow_download_private_error.description: Option label to if permission for Private Browsing mode is required

options_ignore_discarded_tab.description: Option label to ignore discarded tabs

options_shortcut_placeholder.description: Option input placeholder for keyboard shortcut

options_rulesets_add_label.description: Option label for ruleset creation button

options_rulesets_delete_label.description: Option label for ruleset delete button

options_rulesets_global_note.message: Rules can be customised for specific Domains by creating Rulesets. The Global Ruleset applies when no other Rulesets are matched.

options_rulesets_inherit_label.description: Option label for using Global options instead of Ruleset options

options_domain_rule_add_placeholder.description: Option input placeholder for domain rule add

options_domain_rule_delete_tooltip.description: Tooltip for domain rule delete button

options_domain_rule_test_label.message: Enter an image URL to test domain rules

options_domain_rule_test_result_match.description: Result for url matches domain rule

options_domain_rule_test_result_mismatch.description: Result for url does not match domain rule

notification_title_cancelled.description: Notification title when cancelled by user

notification_content_permission_error_ac.description: Notification message when extension could run in current tab
notification_content_permission_error_ac.message: Current tab does not have permission

notification_content_permission_error_ta.description: Notification message when extension could not run in some tabs

notification_content_cancelled.description: Notification message when cancelled by user

notification_content_no_tabs.description: Notification message when the extension did not find any tabs to run in, listing the current extension action

notification_content_no_images.description: Notification message when no images were found on tabs

notification_content_images_saved.description: Notification message when some images were saved

notification_content_images_failed.description: Notification message when some images were not saved

notification_content_paths_failed.description: Notification message when some images did not have filenames
